description: This file defines the 'Room' entity class in the backend domain of a multiplayer game application, including its properties, relationships, and basic management methods.

classes.name: Room
classes.description: Represents a game room with unique code, name, active status, creation timestamp, associated players, and game state.

methods.name: Room
methods.description: Constructor initializing room with code and name.

methods.name: addPlayer
methods.description: Adds a player to this room and sets the player's room reference.

methods.name: removePlayer
methods.description: Removes a player from this room and clears the player's room reference.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the room.

methods.name: getRoomCode
methods.description: Returns the unique room code used for players to join.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the room.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the display name of the room.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns whether the room is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active status of the room.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of room creation.

methods.name: getPlayers
methods.description: Returns the list of players in the room.

methods.name: getGameState
methods.description: Returns the current game state associated with this room.

methods.name: setGameState
methods.description: Sets the game state for this room and links back if necessary.
